title: Van Morrison - The Healing Game [FLAC+MP3](Big Papi)
description:
Van Morrison - The Healing Game [FLAC+MP3](Big Papi) 

Original Release 1997 Polydor 7101-2

Source: CD



By A Customer

This is Van Morrison's best album in my opinion, which is saying a lot, considering the extent of his career. If one were to have only one of his albums, this would be the one to have. There is a thematic unity that seems to hold all the songs together, all written by Van Morrison. "Rough God Goes Riding" and "Sometimes We Cry" are truly superb, but every song is a pleasure in its own right. I have listened many, many times, and never tire.
